messages.body: Did Apple's run in China hit a roadblock? $AAPL #China https://investmentsrevolution.com/2018/04/international-stocks-and-other/chinas-smartphone-saturation-keeps-apple-sales-flat/

links.title: China's smartphone saturation keeps Apple sales flat - Investments Revolution
links.description: UBS predicts Apple's iPhone sales growth in China will be flat this fiscal year, due to the longer upgrade cycles by the country's consumers and rising local competition. "We think it's doubtful China returns to its 2015 peak as local brands have caught up and upgrade cycles are lengthening,".

$AAPL $FB Facebook explains how it can collect info about you even if you never post on Facebook https://www.cnbc.com/2018/04/16/facebook-collects-data-even-when-youre-not-on-facebook.html

links.title: Facebook explains how it can collect info about you even if you never post on Facebook
links.description: Facebook's product management director David Baser just wrote a blog post explaining when Facebook and its partners collect your personal information and when it's shared. It also reiterates how it's able to gather information on people who don't use Facebook. Here's the nugget you need to know about: When does Facebook get data about people from other websites and apps?
